name: Tree Simulator 2023
description:
It's that time! Its time to discover what it means to be a tree! Become a true work of art!
Every frame a painting, every tree an original masterpiece.
Be a tree alone or with friends online! Tree discord

A lot went into 2023 so here is a breakdown of some of the features.

Features

  • Be a tree
  • 3rd "person" camera
  • Stretch your roots and move around.
  • More cosmetic items similar to the "Red tie"
  • Small handcrafted map now with a new area
  • Select from 30 trees
  • Many configurable tree settings
  • Customizable weather system (Rain, Snow, Wind, Fog, Overcast)
  • Day night cycle
  • Seasons (As the seasons change, the trees appearance, weather, and environment will change)
  • Save settings
  • Multiplayer
  • Server admin support
  • Server browser that helps you easily connect with other players
  • Private game support
  • Password required servers (optional)
  • Built in text based chat
  • Ultra-wide monitor support
  • Windowed support (a little wonky)
  • Wallpaper engine support
  • Xbox Controller support
  • PS4 Controller Support

Multiplayer


Be the best forest you can be! Invite up to 250 glorious trees to join your forest. You can host a server and set the amount of trees that can join along with passwords and making the lobby private. Servers that are public will appear in a lobby list when trees click "Join". If a server is private you will only be able to join if that person is on your friends list or by invite.

For transparency, multiplayer is tested with 4 trees, but it should support up to 250.

There is no built-in voice chat. It is recommended that Discord or Steam chat be used.

You can join a game in various ways:

Host a game

  1. Host tree clicks "Host"
  2. Host tree configures various desired settings or leaves them as default (Server name, private, password required)
  3. Host tree clicks "Confirm"

Join a game from the menu

  1. Tree clicks "Join"
  2. Tree observes desired lobby in the list
  3. Tree clicks "Connect" on desired lobby

Join a game from an invite

  1. Host tree presses [Esc] on the keyboard
  2. Host tree clicks "Invite"
  3. Host tree uses invite dialog to invite other trees
  4. Other trees start Tree Simulator 2023
  5. Other trees press [Shift]+[Tab] to activate the Steam overlay
  6. Other trees click "Play Game" in the Steam chat window

Join a game from your friends list

  1. Tree observes friend tree playing Tree Simulator 2023
  2. Tree immediately tells everyone they know
  3. Tree starts Tree Simulator 2023
  4. Tree presses [Shift]+[Tab] to activate the Steam overlay
  5. Tree clicks "Join game" in the Steam overlay from their friends name
